data.text: @Grace_Segers Maybe they could take 15bil out of of the 100bil they want for the green new deal?
@GaryThurner @Grace_Segers How about we put you in touch with the families of these 1451 dead people and you can give them the good news. https://t.co/mruNhP8Ljl
@Grace_Segers Covid is over. It’s time to get over it.

@Grace_Segers It's worth pointing out that the "state money" is money given to the states from the Covid relief bill Biden one year ago that still remains unspent a year later. They were going to reallocate it to pay for the bill, but dems from those states revolted and forced the removal.
Now that the House has figured this out, can't wait for the smooth, drama-free process of passing this in the Senate

Basically:
-WH wanted COVID funding
-GOP demanded funding be offset
-Offsets would have taken state money, but Dems from some of those states say those funds were already planned for use
-Dems just take it out to insure rest of omnibus can pass smoothly
